title: uhm. could i play adc without getting instakilled by everything pls?
body:
its way too frustrating, i dont know if its different when you play premade 5s against other 5man premades, but playing solo as adc is pure terror.
i know, they could do before too, but damn, i just cant enjoy playing adc anymore.
especially {{champion:107}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:1}}  {{champion:67}}  wanna make me quit this game.

replies.body:
I despise ADC for their squishiness.

But that just means that I don't play the role, not that I whine on the forums about it LOL.
I dunno, could you play smart and work together with your team?

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u7XNuVIw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-19T22:21:25.189+0000)
>
> I dunno, could you play smart and work together with your team?

i dunno, most of the time im not able to land one single AA without getting in range from a syndra stun, vayne tumble+stealth, rengar ult, ahri triple dash (she doesnt even need to land her E to kill an adc), sona, etc.

QSS says hi.
CC says hi.
Control Ward says hi.
MR (Hexdrinker/Maw) says hi.
Playing with your goddamn team says hi.

Imo he kind of has a point. I dont think adcs are too weak or anything but the reason I stopped playing adc (I never mained it but I played some adc games) is because my auto attack range is smaller than Malph ult range, old Talon E range, and so on. You know, like all the stuff that kills me.
Of course I can play or build around it but it was just too annoying lol.
That's what your team is for.
Why are you frontlining when you have 4 other people you can stand behind?
Nothing wrong with staying behind your team and playing clean up when all the dangerous abilities are used up already.
Maybe dont play ADC if you are not good at positioning or map awareness, since they are the squishiest role.

> [{quoted}](name=zzerakku,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u7XNuVIw,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-11-19T22:19:16.641+0000)
>
** playing solo as adc is pure terror.**

No durr you're a squishy
its not a sin to buy a defensive item on an adc, 4 damage items give you plenty of damage to take objectives
The Glass cannon is made out of Glass. Who would have thought?
You have my sympathies, but dont try to get any from the boards who are in a very anti ADC mood at the moment.
